content: AI capabilities are currently turned off, which means this agent canâ€™t process chats or tasks. To restore full functionality, enable AI features in the {{productName}} settings.

comment.text: This text explains to administrators that AI features are disabled, preventing the agent from processing chats or tasks. It appears within a chat information block to guide them to enable AI functionality in the product settings. Translators should ensure the terminology around AI and product settings aligns with local conventions.
